Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its value exceeds $800000. We are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our premium product. If you're interested in learning more about the benefits and features of this item, please let me know, and I would be happy to provide you with detailed information. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
